column1: # Title: Regional fertilizer prices for initial NonLandCost calculation
# Description: gcamdata assumed a aglu.FERT_PRICE of 0.224 1975$/kgN in constants.R which was used for calculating after-fertilizer-cost-NonLandCost
# However for regions resulted in higher NonLandCost it could lead to negative profit issues e.g. India Misc crop
# Thus we specific these regional values here but still use aglu.FERT_PRICE for potentially breaked out regions.
# If we can calculate fertilizer price from energy data processing in gcamdata later we can connect them.
